Description: Case size approx 52mm (measure accross bezel), or 56mm including the crown screwed down. NEW WITH TAGS, CASE, AND MANUAL. Invicta Reserve 52mm Thunderbolt Quartz Chronograph Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch Gold tone with Silver Tone accents The Reserve Thunderbolt sets its own standard and then goes even further with a round gold-tone stainless steel case and unidirectional rotating bezel. You'll probably think of the regular Bolt with the cable wire along the bezel – only this one's bigger and thicker at 3mm – while a large crown winds between function pushers (they're large, too). An exhibition case back reveals your movement and a wide bracelet secures it. The cable character continues on the dial as it trims the subdials. Coordinated but still cool, you'll find them in 60-seconds, 30-minute and day of the week formats as a date window lands near 4:00. Luminous accents brighten the hands as they guide you through your day, passing "Invicta Reserve" below 12:00. Details: Movement: Swiss Movement Ronda Z60 Quartz Chronograph Movement Country of Origin: Switzerland Case Measurements: 52mm Case Thickness: 22-1/2mm Crystal: Flame Fusion Crown: Screw Down w/ Function Pushers Bracelet: Stainless Steel Bracelet Measurements: 9" L x 29mm W Clasp: Deployant Water Resistance: 50 ATM - 500 meters - 1650 feet Weight: 13.25 oz Watch Country of Origin: Final assembly changed to China, effective 9-1-2016 Model 21345 With its most inspired creations yet, Invicta demonstrates its technical and design prowess, offering timepieces of style for extreme value. "We have long held firm to the belief that supremely crafted timepieces can be offered for extremely modest sums. It is the founding principle of our flagship and the radical notion that still drives us today. By being true to our convictions, we will continue to turn the balance of power, and deliver true Swiss luxury to anyone who desires it. Let all those who possess our timepieces and pass through our doors witness the quality, value and care in every piece we create, and the spirit of never-ending possibilities in everything we do." These are the words that greet visitors and motivate team members inside the Invicta Watch Group's new worldwide headquarters. Emblazoned in stainless steel, it has been the Invicta message since Day One. With each new timepiece, the company sends up a flare for those looking to be defined not by how much they spend, but how wisely they spend. With its strong collections, the gutsy Swiss brand is guaranteed to keep attracting followers. The art of the craft. Inside an Invicta Workshop It takes years of training and a great deal of pride to achieve glorious Swiss timepieces by hand. But it takes guts and the courage of your convictions to make those timepieces affordable for everyone who appreciates them. At our Swiss workshops, we mix time-honored traditions with a little bit of horse sense every single day to produce the greatest values in the watch-making world.
Title: NEW Invicta Reserve 52mm Thunderbolt Chronograph Stainless Steel Bracelet 21345
